Purpose: To detect and quantify anti-synthetase autoantibodies (e.g., Jo-1, PL-7, PL-12, OJ, EJ) for the diagnosis and management of anti-synthetase syndrome and related autoimmune conditions.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or SST)
Equipment: Automated or manual immunoassay analyzer (e.g., ELISA reader)
